attributes.action: Scrap Quarantine Hotels for vaccinated UK residents from Red List countries.
attributes.background: Let vaccinated UK residents returning from red list countries quarantine at home and take covid test 2 days after returning and if negative let them carry on as normal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

No hotel quarantine for UK citizens, permanent residents and their families
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571447
